name: jimmy

scripts.clean: cmd --% /c "(if exist dist rmdir /s /q dist) & (if exist build rmdir /s /q build) & (if exist .svelte-kit rmdir /s /q .svelte-kit) & (if exist .eslintcache del /f /q .eslintcache)" || rm -rf dist build .svelte-kit .eslintcache
scripts.postbuild: npm run lint || echo "Lint failed. Continuing..."
scripts.postpublish: cmd --% /c "for /f "delims=-" %a in ("%npm_package_version%") do if "%a" == "%npm_package_version%" npm dist-tag add "%npm_package_name%@%npm_package_version%" latest" || npm run postpublish:default
scripts.postpublish:default: if [ "${npm_package_version#*-}" = "${npm_package_version}" ]; then npm dist-tag add "$npm_package_name@$npm_package_version" latest; fi

description: This repository contains Jimmy Luo's personal website. As of August 31, 2022, the main branch of this repository is continuously deployed to https://jimm.my.
author: Jimmy Zhening Luo <jimmy-zhening-luo@users.noreply.github.com> (https://jimm.my/)
